update fu_report_order_flow set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, server_name = #{serverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mt_acc_id = #{mtAccId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_date = #{tradeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_lots = #{orderLots,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_count = #{orderCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_profit = #{orderProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_profit_lots = #{orderProfitLots,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_profit_count = #{orderProfitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_profit_avg = #{orderProfitAvg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_profit_max = #{orderProfitMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_profit_keep = #{orderProfitKeep,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_profit_keep_count = #{orderProfitKeepCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_loss = #{orderLoss,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_loss_lots = #{orderLossLots,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_loss_count = #{orderLossCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_loss_avg = #{orderLossAvg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_loss_max = #{orderLossMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_loss_keep = #{orderLossKeep,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_loss_keep_count = #{orderLossKeepCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_swap = #{orderSwap,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_commission = #{orderCommission,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_income = #{orderIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_income_rate = #{orderIncomeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_win_rate = #{orderWinRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_pl_rate = #{orderPlRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_lots_max = #{orderLotsMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_money_max = #{orderMoneyMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_hold_time_max = #{orderHoldTimeMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_hold_time_avg = #{orderHoldTimeAvg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_ea_count = #{orderEaCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_ea_count_rate = #{orderEaCountRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_expected_return = #{orderExpectedReturn,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id userId, mt_acc_id mtAccId, count(1) orderCount, sum(order_lots) orderLots, sum(CASE WHEN order_profit > 0 then order_profit ELSE 0 end) orderProfit, sum(CASE WHEN order_profit > 0 then order_lots ELSE 0 end) orderProfitLots, sum(CASE WHEN order_profit > 0 then 1 ELSE 0 end) orderProfitCount, max(CASE WHEN order_profit > 0 then order_profit ELSE 0 end) orderProfitMax, sum(CASE WHEN order_profit < 0 then order_profit ELSE 0 end) orderLoss, sum(CASE WHEN order_profit < 0 then order_lots ELSE 0 end) orderLossLots, sum(CASE WHEN order_profit < 0 then 1 ELSE 0 end) orderLossCount, min(CASE WHEN order_profit < 0 then order_profit ELSE 0 end) orderLossMax, sum(order_swap) orderSwap, sum(order_commission) orderCommission, sum(order_profit) orderIncome, max(order_lots) orderLotsMax, max(order_lots*order_open_price) orderMoneyMax, max(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,order_open_date,order_close_date)) orderHoldTimeMax, sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,order_open_date,order_close_date)) orderHoldTimeSum FROM fu_order_customer WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mt_acc_id = #{mtAccId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND order_close_date >= #{dateBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND order_close_date < #{dateEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND order_symbol != '' GROUP BY user_id,mt_acc_id
